English: The lights are on, but there's no one here.
Chinese: 電燈……都亮著，但是沒半個人。
German: Das Licht ist an, aber es ist niemand da.

English:
At first glance, it looks exactly like the fourth
floor we just came from, but something about it
doesn't feel quite right.
Chinese:
乍看之下很像K-Café所在的4樓……
但氣氛有點詭異……
Korean:
얼핏 보기엔 K-카페가 있는 4층하고 똑같지만…
어쩐지 심상치 않은 분위기로군…
German:
Sieht auf den ersten Blick aus wie der vierte
Stock, wo wir gerade waren, aber etwas stimmt
nicht.

English:
It was pitch-dark last time, but this feels just
like when my sister disappeared.
Chinese:
雖然那時候黑漆漆的，但就是這種感覺喔……
姊姊不見的時候也是……
Korean:
그때는 새까맸지만 그래도 이런 느낌이었어…
언니가 없어진 그때도…
German:
Letztes Mal war es stockdunkel, aber sonst war es
genau so, als meine Schwester verschwunden ist.

English:
I see... So you and your sister were exploring
this floor when you encountered the dog at K-Cafe.
Chinese:
這樣啊……莉子跟姊姊在這樓層探險，
之後在K-Café遇到了狗對吧？
Korean:
그렇구나……리코는 언니와 이 층을 탐험한 후
K-카페에서 개를 만난 거구나
German:
Verstehe ... Du hast dich mit deiner Schwester
im Stockwerk umgesehen, da ist euch der Hund im
K-Café begegnet.

English:
Yeah. There was no one around, just like now. It
was so scary.
Chinese:
嗯，就像現在這樣，走廊都沒有人在……
那時候真的好可怕喔。
Korean:
응. 지금처럼 복도엔 아무도 없었고……
그 때도 무지 무서웠어
German:
Ja. Es war sonst niemand dort, so wie jetzt.
Es war richtig gruselig.

English: Don't worry. We're with you this time.
Chinese: 沒關係，這次有我跟可靠的大哥哥在喔。
Korean: 괜찮아, 지금은 나도 믿음직스러운 오빠도 있으니까
German: Keine Sorge. Dieses Mal hast du ja uns dabei.

English:
[p], I'm intrigued to know what's
going on in K-Cafe, but let's investigate this
floor first, just like Rico and her sister did.
Chinese:
[p]，雖然我很在意K-Café裡面的狀況，
但就跟莉子她們一樣，先調查這樓層吧。
Korean:
[p] 군, K-카페 내부도 신경쓰이지만
우선 리코네가 했던 것처럼 여길 조사해보자
German:
[p], ich würde gerne wissen, was im
K-Café los ist, aber machen wir es wie Rico und
ihre Schwester und sehen uns zuerst hier um.

English: Let's go to the arcade and back. Come on, Rico.
Chinese:
對了，先走到遊戲中心再回來吧。
……莉子，走吧。
Korean:
그렇지, 게임 센터 주변까지 갔다가 돌아와볼까?
……리코, 가보자
German:
Gehen wir zur Spielhalle und wieder zurück. Komm
schon, Rico.
